title: test_login_with_valid_and_invalid_credentials
description: Verify login endpoint with valid email and password returns access and refresh tokens and professional data. Test invalid credentials return 401 error. Test missing or invalid tenant slug returns 404 error.

title: test_refresh_access_token_with_valid_and_invalid_refresh_token
description: Verify refresh token endpoint returns new access token when provided valid refresh token. Test invalid or expired refresh token returns 401 error. Test missing or invalid tenant slug returns 404 error.

title: test_logout_invalidate_tokens_and_handle_unauthorized_access
description: Verify logout endpoint invalidates tokens and returns success message. Test unauthorized access returns 401 error. Test missing or invalid tenant slug returns 404 error.

title: test_request_otp_and_verify_otp_for_password_recovery
description: Verify request OTP endpoint sends OTP for valid email and returns success message. Verify verify OTP endpoint validates OTP and issues tokens. Test invalid or expired OTP returns 401 error. Test missing or invalid tenant slug returns 404 error.

title: test_get_professionals_list_with_pagination_and_authorization
description: Verify get professionals endpoint returns paginated list of professionals for authorized users. Test unauthorized access returns 401 error. Test forbidden access returns 403 error. Test missing or invalid tenant slug returns 404 error.

title: test_create_professional_with_admin_role_and_duplicate_email_handling
description: Verify create professional endpoint allows only ADMIN role to create new professional. Test duplicate email returns 409 error. Test unauthorized and forbidden access returns 401 and 403 errors respectively.

title: test_appointment_creation_with_conflict_detection
description: Verify appointment creation endpoint prevents scheduling conflicts by checking overlapping appointments excluding cancelled ones. Test successful creation returns 201. Test time slot conflict returns 409 error.

title: test_financial_transactions_filtering_and_pagination
description: Verify transactions listing endpoint supports filtering by type, category, date range with pagination. Test unauthorized access returns 401 error. Test missing or invalid tenant slug returns 404 error.

title: test_barbershop_get_and_update_with_tenant_validation
description: Verify get barbershop endpoint returns current barbershop data for valid tenant. Verify update barbershop endpoint updates data correctly. Test missing or invalid tenant slug returns 404 error.

title: test_rate_limiting_enforcement_on_protected_endpoints
description: Verify rate limiting middleware enforces limits per IP and tenant on protected endpoints. Test exceeding limits returns HTTP 429 error.
